title: Digital Life (Absolut01) - Novel Updates
author: Absolut01   Ge Zi Li De Ye Wan   Night Within The Lattice   格子裡的夜晚
description: Lu Zhenyu was not a stingy person; however, he prohibited anyone from touching his computer. The reason? It concealed an enormous secret: there was a being inside—a being of numbers; a digital life. Lu Zhenyu himself could not explain how such a being had been born, nor did he have any idea what exactly was going on, but what he did know was that this being came into this world in a windy and rainy night…>
